insert into order_trade_records (trade_number, batch_number, merchant_number, amount, poundage, traded_at, order_id, account_number, account_name, actual_payment_price, paid_result, created_at, updated_at, traded_status, pay_types ) values (#{tradeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{poundage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualPaymentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paidResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tradedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update order_trade_records set trade_number = #{tradeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, batch_number = #{batchNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, merchant_number = #{merchantNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, poundage = #{poundage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, traded_at = #{tradedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_number = #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actual_payment_price = #{actualPaymentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paid_result = #{paidResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, traded_status = #{tradedStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_types = #{payTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, trade_number, batch_number, merchant_number, amount, poundage, traded_at, order_id, account_number, account_name, actual_payment_price, paid_result, created_at, updated_at, traded_status, pay_types from order_trade_records where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
